title: Data Analyst
qualified: Menafsirkan data, menganalisa hasil menggunakan teknik statistik dan memberikan laporan yang sedang berjalan.
Mengembangkan dan mengimplementasikan database, sistem pengumpulan data, analisis data dan strategi lain yang mengoptimalkan efisiensi dan kualitas statistic.
Mendapatkan data dari sumber data primer atau sekunder dan pertahankan database / sistem data.
Mengidentifikasi, menganalisa, dan menafsirkan tren atau pola dalam kumpulan data yang kompleks.
Melakukan filter data dengan meninjau laporan komputer, cetakan, dan indikator kinerja untuk menemukan dan memperbaiki masalah dari berbagai variable.
Bekerja sama dengan seluruh departemen untuk menganalisis kebutuhan bisnis dan informasi.
Berkoordinasi untuk mencari dan menentukan peluang untuk meningkatkan perusahaan berdasarkan analisis data.

title: IT System Development Support (Internship)
qualified: PENGUMUMAN :

Puninar Group tidak pernah memungut biaya apapun dalam proses rekrutmen.
Puninar Group tidak pernah bekerja sama dengan travel agent / biro perjalanan tertentu dalam proses rekrutmen.

Apabila Anda diminta untuk membayar sejumlah uang dalam bentuk pembayaran tiket pesawat dan hotel atau akomodasi lainnya agar diabaikan. Jangan memberikan data pribadi atau data keuangan Anda kepada siapapun.
Jika membutuhkan klarifikasi lebih lanjut dapat langsung menghubungi Puninar Group.

Puninar Group is an affiliated company of Triputra Group. Since established in 1969, Puninar Logistics has grown and developed into foremost and experienced logistics company which leads logistics world in Indonesia with the capability and competence to provide a total logistics solution through its vertical industry operations. Our deep understanding in Customer’s Supply Chain, enable us to add-values along the entire supply chain, starting from freight forwarding and customs clerance of raw production material, inbound logistics, manufacturing materials management, warehousing, distribution, up to post delivery services and return logistics.
Puninar Group has the largest & widest range of logistics facilities & infrastructure:

Equipped with own assets of more that 650 trucks and 13 set of vessels,  and more than  136.00 sqm indoor and 700.000 sqm outdoor warehuse, Puninar extend its capability by heavily investing in  leading world class transportation management system, Oracle Transportation Management, the first 3PL that implementing OTM, equipped by world class standard in Road Transport Safety Mangement Systems (ISO 39001:2012), where Puninar is the first company in Indonesia who achieve this certification. In the area of Warehouse Management, Puninar implementing benchmarked and well proven Warehouse Management System, Kerrier WMS.  In the area of Customs Clearance Services, Puninar develop inhouse Customs Clearance Management Services, a realization of its long standing expertise, knowhow and experience for more that 50 years.

The Company is headquartered in Cakung, Jakarta with facilities located throughout Indonesia, with branch office / operation site in Bekasi, Nagrak, Cakung, Semarang, Surabaya, Kelanis, Banjarmasin, Balikpapan, Makasar.
